packages.name: bootstrap-vue
packages.description: BootstrapVue, with over 40 available plugins and more than 80 custom components, provides one of the most comprehensive implementations of the Bootstrap v4.3 component and grid system for Vue.js, complete with extensive and automated WAI-ARIA accessibility markup.

packages.name: vue-lazyload
packages.description: Vue module for lazyloading images in your applications.

packages.name: vue-fontawesome
packages.description: Font Awesome 5 Vue component using SVG with JS

packages.name: Vue.js notifications
packages.description: Integrated Alerts for Vue

packages.name: Vue.Draggable
packages.description: Vue component (Vue.js 2.0) or directive (Vue.js 1.0) allowing drag-and-drop and synchronization with view model array.

packages.name: Sortable.js
packages.description: Sortable is a JavaScript library for reorderable drag-and-drop lists.

packages.name: vue-fullcalendar
packages.description: Full Calendar for Vue

packages.name: vue-datetime
packages.description: Mobile friendly datetime picker for Vue. Supports date, datetime and time modes, i18n and disabling dates.

packages.name: vue-moment
packages.description: Handy Moment.js filters for your Vue.js project.

packages.name: Vue Visual
packages.description: Vue 2 image and video loader supporting lazy loading, cover videos, and more!

packages.name: vue-avatar
packages.description: An avatar component for vue.js.

packages.name: vue-gallery
packages.description: VueJS responsive and customizable image and video gallery, carousel and lightbox, optimized for both mobile and desktop web browsers.

packages.name: vue-gallery
packages.description: A responsive, customizable and touch and mobile ready VueJS image and video gallery, carousel and lightbox built with modern Javascript.

packages.name: vue-navigation-bar
packages.description: A simple, pretty navbar for your Vue projects.

packages.name: vue-axios
packages.description: A small wrapper for integrating axios to Vuejs

packages.name: axios
packages.description: Promise based HTTP client for the browser and node.js

packages.name: XMLHttpRequest Emulation for node.js
packages.description: This is an npm package that implements the W3C XMLHttpRequest specification on top of the node.js APIs.

packages.name: blueimp Gallery
packages.description: blueimp Gallery is a touch-enabled, responsive and customizable image and video gallery, carousel and lightbox, optimized for both mobile and desktop web browsers.

packages.name: navigation
packages.description: A simple JS Navigation

packages.name: datetime-js
packages.description: Customize output for a javascript Date object
